#summary Guidelines for webpage colors
#labels Phase-Implementation

=Guideline for Webpage Colors=

We use a green and yellow color scheme for the MolTK web sites,  Based on the Sahara theme from http://www.freecsstemplates.org/.

==Background Colors==

Large sections of background should use the gradient image a3.gif from the modified Sahara style. http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/css/sahara/images/a3.gif

Otherwise the main background should be color {{{#FEFEF2}}} http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/FEFEF2.jpg

When a subtle contrast in background is needed, use the darker web color !LemonChiffon http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/LemonChiffon.jpg



{{{
body 
{
    background-color: #FEFEF2;
    background-image: url('images/a3.gif');
    background-repeat: repeat-x;
}
}}}

==Text Colors==

Most text should be black.  

===Links===

Link text should be !DarkGreen http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/DarkGreen.jpg.  Visited link text should be Green http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/Green.jpg

{{{
a:link {color: DarkGreen;}
}}}


{{{
a:visited {color: Green;}
}}}

Remove the underline when hovering over link text.  (Except that one of the API document sets works the opposite way.  That's OK too I suppose.)

{{{
a:hover	{text-decoration: none;}
}}}

==Menu Colors==

Use white text on green background.

The background should be a1.gif from the modified Sahara style. http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/css/sahara/images/a1.gif

Otherwise the menu background should be web color !DarkOliveGreen. http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/DarkOliveGreen.jpg

Menu hover effect should use Sahara a2.gif,
http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/css/sahara/images/a2.gif
or color {{{#515815}}} http://moltk.rotatingpenguin.com/images/515815.jpg

Color {{{#515815}}} can also be used as a non-link accent color.

Current selected menu item can be black text on !LemonChiffon background.

{{{
menu bar
{
	background-color: DarkOliveGreen;
	background-image: url('images/a1.gif');
	background-repeat: repeat-x;
	color: #ffffff;
}
}}}

{{{
menu bar: hover
{
	background-color: #515815;
	background-image: url('images/a2.gif');
	background-repeat: repeat-x;
}
}}}
